name: Rick & Morty
about: Search for your fav characters of your favorite tv series
goals: The main goal for this short project was to work with ReactJS and create a small SPA. The main characteristics it should have was to render the first projects of the rickandmortyapi alphabetically. After that, each character card should be clickable and show an information page with more trivia of the character. Also, a text input and some filters have been implemented so the user could search for the desired character. Also, I decided to add a landing page for the project and a random quote which is also generated by the same API.

name: Awesome Profile Cards React
about: React SPA that allows the user to create a personal business card and share it on his social media.
goals: In this team project we had to refactor the code from another team and implement ReactJS. The main challenge was to get to know how the workflow changes comparing to a project built with Javascript Vanilla and also get to work with inherited code and the problems that come with it.
